name: Achievement Hunter: Knight
detailed_description:
Achievement Hunter: Knight - this is a 2D platformer with elements of a shooter,
the main feature of which is the vanguard game art,
the possibility of pumping their weapons and an infinite number of enemies.

In this 2d action / shooter you will play for the knight who wants to stop the dragonl who are trying to destroy his city.
You do not have any allies. There are only you, your sword and a huge number of dragon.
Fight for your home, increase your skill, sword and prevent invasion of dragon into your city.

Game features:
  • Minimum allowable price
  • Real gun
  • Fearless protagonist
